LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.label: Assault Piercer
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.description:
A submachine gun chambered in a high-caliber round, capable of quick draw and penetrating most armored targets in short range. Referred as a piercer due to lack of a comparable weapon in the human arsenal.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, thus a standard baseline human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance from specialized equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_AssaultPiercer.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_Pistol.label: Tactical autopistol bullet
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.label: Flameblaster
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.description: A flame launcher used by mechs that can effectively ignite flammable materials within its range
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.barrel-0.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Flameblaster.tools.barrel-1.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.label: PDW
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.description: A mass-produced submachine gun, which was designed to be only capable of hip-fire so it's inaccurate in range; but its caliber and ability to quick draw the gun makes it the perfect weapon for urban combat against militors.
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_PDW.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: PDW
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.label: Mech Pistol
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.description:
A defensive firearm with refined manufacture processing and additional tactical attachments, it's too heavy for a baseline human but suitable for a mech soldier. Offers better stopping power than comparable weapons.
This weapon is designed specifically for automatroid use, thus a standard baseline human may be unable to use them normally without external assistance from specialized equipment or being extra strong.
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.tools.grip.label: grip
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_TaticalPistol.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Mech Pistol
